name: Autumn Salad
instructions: Slice sweet potato into thin wedges or quarters. Toss with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Rinse and dry 1 can of chickpeas. Toss in olive oil, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, pepper.
Spread sweet potato and chickpeas on a baking sheet. Roast at 425Â°F for 30 minutes.
Shred Brussels sprouts.  Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Add to the oven to roast for 15 minutes.

Make dressing in a blender:

0.5 cup olive oil, 0.5 cup shredded Parmesan, 1/4 cup tahini, 1.5 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, 0.5 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 cloves garlic, salt and pepper to taste.

Blend until smooth.
